item.title: All
item.description: Verse LeGallienne Wake! for the sun, the shepherd of the sky, Has penned the stars within their fold on high, And, shaking darkness from his mighty limbs, Scatters the daylight from his burning eye.+++(5)+++ Verse LeGallienne In Heaven’s blue bowl the wine of morning brims, A little cloud, a rose-leaf, in it swims, The thirsty earth drinks morning from a bowl Whose sides are space and crusted stars its rims.
